action.action-desc: Mr. Buchanan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to search all public records to determine if an alien is inadmissible to the United States.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Social Media Screening for Terrorists Act of 2017.

section.header: Requirement to search records of aliens applying for admission to the United States
section.text: The Secretary of Homeland Security shall search all public records, including Internet sites and social media profiles, to determine if an alien applying for admission to the United States is inadmissible under section 212 of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1182).
